description:
A vampire empress is born, and Ronaldo meets Draluc`s family at their annual New Year`s party.
Source: Funimation

titles.title: Joutei Tanjou Monogatari / Draluc-ke no Ichizoku / Zoku Draluc-ke no Ichizoku
La naissance d`une impératrice / La famille de Draluc / La famille de Draluc, suite
Tale of the Empress`s Birth / Draluc`s Family / Draluc`s Family, Continued
女帝誕生物語 / ドラルク家の一族 / 続・ドラルク家の一族
